idea-plugin.change-notes:
The first release. It will change your background images each branch. I often forgot branch and commit wrongly, So I built this.
- Install plugin
- Go to your project (must using git)
- Go to Tool menu and click GitLazyEye (Ctrl + Shift + G)
- Select image path for each branch. * Checkout branch
idea-plugin.name: GitLazyEye
idea-plugin.description: This plugin for change background image for each git branch. For example, if you have "very" serious branch then change wallpaper "very" special image. Then you can find out easily what branch you are.
